title: Kabbage Drums Up Gig Economy Business
itunes:title: Kabbage Drums Up Gig Economy Business
description:
Rob Frohwein, CEO at Kabbage, talks about Drum, a venture to connect businesses with network sales force to better connect with customers.

Host: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
